sentences.en: ‘That’s her,’ said Toby, indicating a girl on the other side of the room
sentences.cn: “就是她。”托比指着房间另一端的一个女孩说。

sentences.en: Ballpark estimates indicate a price tag of $90 million a month.
sentences.cn: 大致的估计费用为每月9,000万美元。

sentences.en: Dreams can help indicate your true feelings.
sentences.cn: 梦可以反映你的真实感情。

sentences.en: Eye problems can indicate an unhealthy lifestyle with subsequent suppression of the immune system.
sentences.cn: 患眼疾可能表明生活方式不健康，而且免疫系统同时受到抑制。

sentences.en: He told us when to indicate and when to change gear.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们何时打转向灯、何时换挡。

sentences.en: Indicate whether the following statements are true or false .
sentences.cn: 标出下列说法是对还是错。

sentences.en: Marks in the roadway seem to indicate that he skidded taking a sharp turn.
sentences.cn: 从车道上的痕迹来看，他似乎在急转弯时打滑了。

sentences.en: Mr. Rivers has indicated that he may resign.
sentences.cn: 里弗斯先生已经暗示他可能要辞职。

sentences.en: New figures indicate the recession may be easing up.
sentences.cn: 新的数据显示经济衰退可能有所缓和。

sentences.en: Pelham moved across to indicate a wall chart.
sentences.cn: 佩勒姆走过去指着一张挂图。

sentences.en: Please indicate whether you consider the above views sound or not.
Record profits in the retail market indicate a boom in the economy.
sentences.cn: 零售市场上有史以来的最高利润显示出经济的突飞猛进。

sentences.en: Road markings indicate where you can stop.
sentences.cn: 道路标志告诉你哪里可以停车。

sentences.en: Rosy morning clouds indicate rain, and a rosy sunset means fine weather.
sentences.cn: 早霞主雨, 晚霞主晴.

sentences.en: Statistics indicate that depressed patients are more likely to become ill than are normal people.
sentences.cn: 统计显示抑郁症患者比正常人更容易生病。

sentences.en: That’s her,’ said Toby, indicating a girl on the other side of the room. “
sentences.cn: “就是她。”托比指着房间另一端的一个女孩说。

sentences.en: The last figures so far this year indicate a rise of 13.8%.
sentences.cn: 今年到目前为止的最新数据显示增长了13.8%。

sentences.en: The needles that indicate your height are at the top right-hand corner.
sentences.cn: 显示你身高的指针在右上角。

sentences.en: The study indicates a connection between poverty and crime.
sentences.cn: 研究显示贫穷和犯罪有关联。

words.tran_cn: 陈述语气；陈述语气的动词形式
指示器；[试剂] 指示剂；[计] 指示符；压力计

trans.tran_cn: 表明，暗示，指示，象征，打转向灯指示转弯，被建议
trans.tran_en: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true

trans.tran_cn: 标示， 指示， 指出； 表明， 暗示
trans.tran_en: to show that a particular situation exists, or that something is likely to be true
